MultiSelectListPreference.android:title: Grade Levels
MultiSelectListPreference.android:summary: Specify the grade level(s) to filter events and announcements by. If you choose none of the options, no filtering by grade level is done.
Specify the gender(s) to filter events and announcements by. If you choose none of the options, no filtering by gender is done.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable leader-only features
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Leaders have special access to certain features. Turn this on only if you are a leader and have been provided with a username and password.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Allow data caching
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When this is on, data consumption may be slightly lowered.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show invalid objects
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: While this is on, Merge will not filter out invalid objects. Merge may crash if you attempt to interact with invalid objects.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable logging
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: While this is on, Merge will record usage events, including crashes. After modifying this setting, restart the Merge app to apply changes.
